statement.p: Write the equation for this graph. It is in the form \displaystyle{y}={b}^{{\pm{\left({x}-{h}\right)}}}+{k}.

solution.p: We look next for a point one unit above this asymptote. That occurs at \displaystyle{x}=-{4}.
Next we look one unit to the right. Here we see \displaystyle{y}={6}. This is 4 above the asymptote, so the base is 4.
